Title: Queen
Summary: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

Title: Z for Zachariah
Summary: In the wake of a disaster that wipes out most of civilization.two men and a young woman find themselves in an emotionally charged love triangle as the last known survivors.

Title: Red Joan
Summary: The story of Joan Stanley.who was exposed as the K.G.B.'s longest-serving British spy.
